message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
I understand you want the larger share, so I propose a 55/45 split in your favor.  Let's close this out while the money is still worth something.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need the larger share.  58/42 is my final offer.
This is a fair offer considering the inflation. I'm taking a smaller percentage than my last offer to meet you closer to the middle.
Bob, we're running out of time.  56/44 is my last offer.  Take it or leave it.
